original_text: The outside wall of the side rooms was 2½ metres thick. There was an open space between these rooms and the rooms that the priests used. It was 10 metres wide, all around the temple building.
korean_text: 성전 골방 삼면에 너비가 스무 척 되는 뜰이 둘려 있으며

sentences.original_text: The outside wall of the side rooms was 2½ metres thick.
There was an open space between these rooms
sentences.korean_translation: 이 방들 사이에는 열린 공간이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the rooms that the priests used.
